name: Wave (itch) (FXSF)
description:
I'm extremely proud to present my first full-fledged visual novel, "Wave"!

The story revolves around a semi-classical high school setting, with many fresh scenarios and memorable events. Starting off as a first year at a new school you end up meeting some extraordinary classmates right at the first day. If they weren't enough to make your school life vivid more than enough... a certain video game comes across to mix it all the more!

Genres: school life, slice of life, comedy, romance, ecchi, drama

Features: 

  • Four different routes with over 20 special scenes to unlock
  • Dozens of hilarious moments in a every-dayish setting
  • As you'd guess... *cough*, smutty stuff is included (not a H-game, though)
  • Possibly something deeper beneath the waves as well!
  • Oh... and we're not in Japan, this time

Under production since ...forever (2012), it's finally time to take in feedback and experiences about the game from you, fellow classmates! So enjoy and drop me a post or message if you feel like it!
